= Introduction =

A new theme must consist of theme.css file and custom images.

= Details =

 To create your own theme you must place in the public  folder the following structure of files. The CSS file must be placed in the GWT module folder public/advaced/themes/'<'name_of_your_theme>/ . For images you should create any folder you want and use *relative* paths in the CSS file. Usually all images are placed in the same folder. 

 public
     advanced
         themes
             <your_theme_name>
                 images
                  ...
                theme.css
